name: Sobaki
description:
Welcome to Sobaki!  A little game where you help a fox spirit run his Ramen Restaurant while serving Yokais.  Play time: ~3min. Includes:
  • 6 interesting Yokai Customers that can't wait to try your delicious Ramen‧₊˚✩彡 
  • 3 cute Wallpapers you can download on the right ➜
  • Adorable 2D Graphics that make you fall in love with Sobaki in 3 minutes｡.∞♡*♥
Sobaki is an unfinished game that was created for a college assignment by a group of 4 students with no knowledge of coding. Therefore there are no further plans of continuing the game. The upload of Sobaki was out of genuine love and adoration for a project that ended but wanted to be kept in remembrance because of the effort that was poured in.   The Developers; @ Bamcchin━☆・*。@Felikimchi━☆・*。@Cookihaiiu━☆・*。@Stasha━☆・*。 How to Play: Please first click on Settings and set the game to full screen before starting the game! 

1) Select the noodles and Broth to cook the Ramen in the Pot

 2) When the Spoon stops spinning, click on the Pot to  Create the Noodle Soup

3-5) Click the 3 working Ingredients (Eggs, Mushrooms and Meat) to put them on the smaller table 

6) By repeatedly clicking on the Eggs and Mushrooms they will be cut

7) The Mushrooms and the Meat need to be put on the grill for further preparing  - when they're finished, click on them again to put them into the noodle soup

8) Click on the Noodle Soup to give it to the customer

9) Click on the different colored dangos to create Dango Stick

10) Click on the blue Bootle to pour drink

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • Delete Items by clicking "D" while hovering with your Mouse over the Ingredient you want to delete
  • If you click on "Start next day" after finishing a playthrough and it doesn't start then redirect to the main menu by clicking "esc" twice and just start the game again or just click on Menu instead of "Start new day" and start playing from there again <3
¸.•*'Meet the Customers'*•.¸  Yuki Onna Iwana Bozu Ao bōzu Kappa Ao-Andō Tengu
